items.Justification: This article is about EEG data preprocessing for self-supervised learning, which is not related to Free Space Optical Communication (FSOC) or the researcher's interests.

This article discusses Reconfigurable Intelligent Surfaces (RIS)-aided bistatic radar for rapid non-line-of-sight sensing in the terahertz band, which is not directly related to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This article focuses on the spectral efficiency of movable and rotary access points under Rician fading, which is related to wireless communication but not specifically FSOC or adaptive optics.

This article presents an online machine learning-based joint channel estimation and MIMO decoding for dynamic channels, which is related to communication systems but not directly relevant to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This article introduces an analog spiking neuron in CMOS 28 nm for large-scale neuromorphic processors, which is not related to FSOC, adaptive optics, or optical communication.
